What are the treatments for GRACILE syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of GRACILE syndrome:  - Genetic Testing Registry: GRACILE syndrome  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Aminoaciduria  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Cholestasis   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliative
